techmeme.title: Google plans to test search and shopping ads in its AI Overviews, drawing from advertisers' existing campaigns; AI Overviews rolled out to US users last week (Paresh Dave/Wired)
A live stream of Microsoft's Build 2024 keynote (Microsoft Developer on YouTube)
Microsoft ships Azure AI Studio in broad availability, adds support for OpenAI's GPT-4o, and announces a new multimodal model in its lightweight Phi-3 family (Kevin Okemwa/Windows Central)
Microsoft debuts a new AI feature for Edge to translate spoken content via dubbing and subtitles live, on YouTube, LinkedIn, Coursera, news sites, and more (Emma Roth/The Verge)
Microsoft launches Copilot Extension for GitHub, letting developers build third-party skills into Copilot, starting with DataStax, Stripe, MongoDB, and more (Frederic Lardinois/TechCrunch)
